name: DeRailed
description:
When a domestic terrorist resurfaces it falls on an overburdened police department to discover his plot and put an end to it, and as a washed up detective leading the renewed investigation things begin to not appear as they seem.

Key Features

Unforgiving- "Keeping games challenging but fair" is our design philosophy, and the difficulty that DeRailed's campaign offers is a true challenge to overcome

Unforgettable- A suspense filled action packed story will keep you on your toes and your heart on its knees

Feature Packed- With the purchase of DeRailed you will be able to download the full single-player experience that comes packaged in DeRailed, and the planned future multiplayer

The flashlight system blends with the first person gameplay and the dark content driven environments to create an extremely immersive experience.
A wide variety of weapons to choose from and Ai's to battle and outsmart allow players to rise to the challenge and complete the single-player campaign.
